name: ONGO-World
description:
BUILD PHASE -STOPPED

The reason for this is that the game is getting too large for me to handle but once again this is a learning experience on unity still and have few milestones to go through. 

INFO

ONGO-World is a first person exploration game made in unity. Your purpose is to explore the ONGO-System, going to different planets, talk to other life forms, and fight enemies.

If you cant tell this is another small game project of mine and surprisingly the game was made in 5 days.

INSTRUCTIONS

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Left mouse - Shoot

R - Reload
